name: Clean Disk Space
description: Clean disk space by deleting temporary files, clearing log files, and vacuuming system journal to free up storage when disk usage is high or server is running out of space.

name: Clear Application Cache
description: Clear application cache for Django or Flask web apps by removing cached files, static assets, and temporary config data to fix stale configuration issues or high web latency.

name: Flush DNS Cache
description: Flush and clear DNS cache on the server to fix DNS resolution errors, outdated domain records, and network name lookup failures.

name: Kill High CPU Process
description: Identify and terminate the process using the highest CPU to recover from performance degradation, system slowdowns, or CPU bottlenecks.

name: Kill High Memory Process
description: Terminate the process consuming the most RAM to reduce memory pressure, prevent out-of-memory errors, and restore system responsiveness.

name: Reclaim Docker Disk Space
description: Free Docker disk space by removing unused containers, images, and volumes to fix low disk alerts and optimize container storage usage.

name: Restart Docker Daemon
description: Restart Docker service (dockerd) to fix stuck containers, unresponsive Docker commands, or container networking issues.

name: Restart Nginx Web Server
description: Restart the Nginx web server to resolve HTTP 5xx errors, service downtime, or misconfigured reverse proxy issues.

name: Restart Node Exporter Agent
description: Restart the Prometheus Node Exporter agent to fix missing or outdated system metrics and restore monitoring visibility.

name: Restart PostgreSQL Database
description: Restart PostgreSQL database service to recover from query deadlocks, slow transactions, failed client connections, or high database latency.

name: Scale CPU Limit for Container
description: Increase CPU limit or shares for a specific Docker container to handle high CPU usage alerts, improve container performance, and prevent throttling.
